newsitem.title: EU: EP BUDGETS COMMITTEE AGENDA - APRIL 14-15.
newsitem.headline: EP BUDGETS COMMITTEE AGENDA - APRIL 14-15.

text.p: Committee on Budgets [[ Monday 14 April 1997 ]] 1. Adoption of draft agenda (222.015 ) 2. Chairman's announcements 3. Approval of minutes of meetings of: - 10 March 1997 (PE221.999 ) - 19-20 March 1997 (PE222.001) 4. Appointment of rapporteurs and draftsmen - decisions on procedure 5. Financial implications of enlargement of the Union (PE222.012 ) - Rapporteur: Efthymios CHRISTODOULOU (PE222.003 ) - Exchange of views in preparation for the Round Table on 22 May (PE221.996/ANN) ===] 1998 budget 6.1 Budget 1998 - Section III (T05367) BUD0083 + BUDG Fond R TILLICH Stanislaw. (PPE) - Working Document 2: Preparation for enlargement (PE222.000 ) - Exchange of views 6.2 Financial perspective: adaptation and technical adjustment - T05398 - ( BUD0088 - SEC(97)0364 - C4-0111/97 (PE222.008 ) - SEC(97)0362 - Rapporteur: Stanislaw TILLICH - Consideration and adoption of a draft report 6.3 EP estimates for 1998 (T05370) BUD0086 + BUDG Fond R TOMLINSON John E. (PSE) (PE222.014) - Consideration of draft report - Deadline for tabling amendments 6.4 Information policy: EURONEWS - Rapporteurs: Stanislaw TILLICH and Laurens Jan BRINKHORST - - Joint Working Document 3 (PE222.005 ) - Exchange of views ===] 1997 budget 7.1 Implementation of the 1997 budget - other institutions - Rapporteur: Juan-Manuel FABRA-VALLES - - Notice to members 8/97 (PE222.009 ) - - Notice to members 9/97 (PE222.010 ) 7.2 Possible transfers 8. Arable crops and agricultural structures: amendment of Regulations (EEC) 1765/92 and 2328/91 (T04950) CNS96213 COM(96)0422 C4-0449/96 CNS96212 COM(97)0022 C4-0448/96 + BUDG Avis A KATIFORIS Georgios. (PSE) (PE219.055/DEF) F AGRI Fond R FUNK Honor. (PPE) (PE219.617 ) - Adoption of draft opinion 9. Amendment of the Financial Regulation applicable to the general budget of the European Communities (SEM 2000) (T04961) CNS96189 COM(96)0351 C4-0497/96 + BUDG Avis A DELL'ALBA Gianfranco (ARE) (PE221.614 ) F CONT Fond R SARLIS Pavlos.
